headline: Is Albemarle (ALB) Pricing Look Stretched After Strong Lithium Driven Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Albemarle's current share price still offers value, you are not alone, especially given how heavily discussed lithium related names have become with long term investors. The stock most recently closed at US$184.93, with returns of 9.8% over 7 days, a 4.8% decline over 30 days, 28.5% year to date, 139.0% over 1 year, a 22.8% decline over 3 years and 38.7% over 5 years. Taken together, these figures give a mixed picture of how the market has been pricing the...
